DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare pain degree primary cesarean section repeat cesarean section , investigate role flurbiprofen axetil postoperative analgesia , provide reference clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Incision Pain Uterine Contraction Pain After Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: No premedication give . The temperature operate room maintain 22˚ C. Patients position supine 15° leave lateral tilt achieve use wedge right buttock . Electrocardiograph ( ECG ) , pulse oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) , systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) heart rate ( HR ) monitor one anesthesiologist ( S/5 Anesthesia Monitor , GE Healthcare , Helsinki , Finland ) . Peripheral vein catheterization right hand perform , prehydration give . A fixed volume 500 ml hydroxyethyl starch solution infuse rate 0.2 ml•kg-1•min-1 , Lactated Ringer 's solution infuse rate end surgery . Combined spinal-epidural anesthesia administer patient leave lateral position L3-4 vertebral interspace . A 16-gauge Tuohy needle place epidural space use loss resistance saline , 25-gauge Whitacre spinal needle insert Tuohy needle dura mater puncture . Once free flow clear cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) observe spinal needle , 10 mg ( 2 mL ) isobaric bupivacaine 0.5 % dilute CSF 2.5 mL , inject 15-30 s. After placement fixation epidural catheter , patient position supine 15° leave lateral tilt , oxygen give via nasal catheter 2L.min-1 . The sensory block level cold monitor every three minute ( 1 , 4 , 7 10 min ) alcohol swab record time point 10 min . Hypotension define SBP low 80 % baseline value , treat intravenous phenylephrine 100 µg require . Intravenous atropine 0.3 mg give severe sinus bradycardia ( HR < 50 beats/min ) . Surgery allow start sensory block reach T6 level ; level achieve , patient exclude study . For patient inadequate sensory block , 1.5 % lidocaine give epidural catheter . Four group divide base surgical type postoperative analgesia regimen , 20 case group : primary cesarean section + postoperative analgesia sufentanil plus flurbiprofen axetil group ( Group SF1 ) , primary cesarean section+postoperative analgesia sufentanil group ( Group S1 ) , repeat cesarean Section + postoperative analgesia sufentanil plus flurbiprofen axetil group ( Group SF2 ) , repeat cesarean section+ postoperative analgesia sufentanil group ( Group S2 ) . Analgesia regimen : PCIA,100 ml ; sufentanil 100 ug , ramosetron 0.3 mg , flurbiprofen axetil 100 mg ( varied group ) ; backgroup dosage 2 ml/h , PCA 2 ml time , lock time 20 min . The score incision pain uterine contraction pain 24 h , 48 h 72 h operation dose pump time analgesia pump 24 h operation record .
DOC.criteria: Eighty woman undergo elective cesarean section general anesthesia enrol prospective observational study . Diabetes controlled insulin Preeclampsia Heart diseases History take drug potentially affect cardiovascular system . Patients fast least 8 hour surgery premedication give
